author: apdelgado
title: Decent good hotel near Central Park -
text: Went there for work. Found the hotel pretty decent compared to others in the city. Good size rooms and comfortable. Walls were a bit thin so you could hear the next door neighbors and lift. Quite enjoyed the breakfast, not the cheapest but very very plentiful.
